response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a significant asset to you. Considering its worth to you and the market, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $950,000. This price reflects my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while also maximizing the value I receive for such an important asset. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
